resources.string: YTP3 sniffs YouTube for the track you enter and downloads the most relevant search result. If its not sure about it, you are redirected to a manual download page.

There was a problem connecting to YouTube. If there is no problem with your internet connection, then we must be leveling up our servers. The service will resume in some time. Or just try again a few times and it might work.
Tip: You don\'t need to use space between words.
